verses.roman:
uṭhaha, pūjārī, kara dvāra vimocana
kṣīra eka rākhiyāchi sannyāsi-kāraṇa

synonyms: uṭhaha—please get up; pūjārī—O priest; kara—just do; dvāra—the door; vimocana—opening; kṣīra—sweet rice; eka—one pot; rākhiyāchi—I have kept; sannyāsi—of the mendicant, Mādhavendra Purī; kāraṇa—for the reason.
translation: "O priest, please get up and open the door of the temple. I have kept one pot of sweet rice for the sannyāsī Mādhavendra Purī.
